actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit the issuance of tax-exempt bonds for air and water pollution control facilities.
short_title: Pollution Control Equipment Investment Act of 1995

summary.text: Pollution Control Equipment Investment Act of 1995 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit the issuance of tax-exempt bonds for air or water pollution control facilities.

titles.title: Pollution Control Equipment Investment Act of 1995
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit the issuance of tax-exempt bonds for air and water pollution control facilities.
